Pack.Title: ZenCart Fraktpriser
Pack.Description: This ZenCart module adds the possibility of letting users pick their preferred shipping method. It connects to Bring's Shipping Guide API to fetch prices, estimated delivery times and product descriptions.

Install.Step: This widget depends on jQuery, so please add jQuery to your site first.

Add the Optional Post Office widget:

<script type="text/javascript" src="http://fraktguide.bring.no/fraktguide/js/utleveringsenhet-1.0.0.js"></script>
